DBobject.Name: dbo.states
DBobject.author: Subhani
DBobject.UpgradeScript: IF Not Exists(select * from sys.tables where name ='states') Begin CREATE TABLE [dbo].[states]( [stateId] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [stateName] [varchar](max) NULL ) End

DBobject.Name: dbo.Hobbies
DBobject.author: Subhani
DBobject.UpgradeScript: IF Not Exists(select * from sys.tables where name ='Hobbies') Begin CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Hobbies]( [HobbieID] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [HobbieName] [varchar](max) NULL, ) End

DBobject.Name: dbo.EMP
DBobject.author: Subhani
DBobject.UpgradeScript: IF Not Exists(select * from sys.tables where name ='EMP') Begin CREATE TABLE [dbo].[EMP]( [iMasterId] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [sName] [varchar](max) NULL, [biPhone] [bigint] NULL, [sEmail] [varchar](max) NULL, [sdateofbirth] [date] NULL, [CityId] [int] NULL, [StateId] [int] NULL, [iQualification] [int] NULL, [sHobbies] [varchar](max) NULL, ) End

DBobject.Name: dbo.citys
DBobject.author: Subhani
DBobject.UpgradeScript: IF Not Exists(select * from sys.tables where name ='citys') Begin CREATE TABLE [dbo].[citys]( [cityId] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [cityName] [varchar](max) NULL, [stateId] [int] NULL, ) End

DBobject.Name: dbo.emp_save
DBobject.author: Subhani

DBobject.Name: dbo.GetCitys
DBobject.author: Subhani
DBobject.UpgradeScript: IF Not Exists(select * from sys.procedures where object_id=OBJECT_ID('GetCitys')) Begin create procedure [dbo].[GetCitys](@Id int) As begin select cityId,cityName from citys where stateId=@Id; end End

DBobject.Name: dbo.GetallStates
DBobject.author: Subhani
DBobject.UpgradeScript: IF Not Exists(select * from sys.procedures where object_id=OBJECT_ID('GetallStates')) Begin create procedure [dbo].[GetallStates] As begin select * from states; end End

DBobject.Name: dbo.GetallHobbies
DBobject.author: Subhani
DBobject.UpgradeScript: IF Not Exists(select * from sys.procedures where object_id=OBJECT_ID('GetallHobbies')) Begin create procedure [dbo].[GetallHobbies] As begin select * from Hobbies; end End

DBobject.Name: dbo.GetAll_Emp
DBobject.author: Subhani
DBobject.UpgradeScript: IF Not Exists(select * from sys.procedures where object_id=OBJECT_ID('GetAll_Emp')) Begin CREATE procedure [dbo].[GetAll_Emp] As begin select e.iMasterId,e.sName,e.biPhone,e.sEmail,e.sdateofbirth,c.cityName,s.stateName,e.iQualification,e.sHobbies from EMP e inner join states s on e.StateId=s.StateId inner join citys c on c.cityId =e.CityId; end End
